metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44442 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
[GIMP PSD File Parsing Heap-based Buffer Overflow Remote Code ExecutionVulnerability]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-44442` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gimp - 2.10.18-1ubuntu0.1
gimp-data - 2.10.18-1ubuntu0.1
libgimp2.0 - 2.10.18-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gimp package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.10.18-1ubuntu0.1').
